query_1.text: How did Michael Jackson's innovative approach to music videos and performance artistry redefine the entertainment industry and influence future generations of artists?

query_2.text: How did Whitney Houston's unique vocal style and emotional delivery influence the evolution of pop and R&B music during the late 20th century?

query_3.text: How did David Bowie's ability to constantly reinvent his musical style and persona reflect the cultural and social changes of the 20th century?

query_4.text: How did Freddie Mercury's unique blend of theatricality and musical innovation influence the evolution of rock music and the performance style of future artists?

query_5.text: How has Ariana Grande's evolution as an artist and public figure influenced discussions around mental health and self-acceptance in the music industry?

query_6.text: How did Bob Marley's experiences with social injustice and personal struggles influence the themes of resilience and hope in his music?
